document.full_text: suicide bombers killed 80 people at a pakistani paramilitary academy on friday in revenge for the death of osama bin laden in a u.s. raid and militants in pakistan vowed to carry out more attacks.
document.title: bombers take bin laden revenge in pakistan
lines_and_colors: suicide bombers killed 80 people at a pakistani paramilitary academy on friday in revenge for the death of osama bin laden in a u.s. raid and militants in pakistan vowed to carry out more attacks.
